mainSection.title: Building Futures
mainSection.subTitle: Comprehensive Construction & Repair Solutions
mainSection.content: From building your dream home to enhancing existing spaces, handling repairs, and managing your real estate assets with precision, we are your trusted partner every step of the way.

aboutSection.title: About us
aboutSection.subTitle: We work so that you live in your dreams
aboutSection.content1: New Energy Development is your trusted partner for property management and high-quality construction services in the Cote d'Azur region of France and Monaco. We've become a go-to consultant for many, offering personalized service, reliability, professionalism, and convenient payment options.
aboutSection.content2: Established in 2015, we hold all necessary licenses and insurance for operations in France and Monaco.

1.title: 7+ years experience
1.content: We accompany you every step of our collaboration.

2.title: Professional team
2.content: The high quality of work has been noted in over 300 positive reviews.

3.title: Trusted partners
3.content: A network of verified partners across various fields (design, furniture manufacturing, etc.).

4.title: Speak your language
4.content: In our arsenal, we have Ukrainian, Russian, German, French, English, Italian, and Dutch languages.

servicesSection.title: Our services
servicesSection.subTitle: High-quality work of any complexity
servicesSection.worksTitle: What is included in our services?

1.title: Engineering systems
1.subTitle: Design, installation and maintenance of engineering networks and systems.

works.2: - Installation and maintenance of automation and dispatch systems;
works.3: - Installation of fire alarm and fire extinguishing systems;
works.4: - Installation of security and video surveillance systems;

2.title: Electrical work
2.subTitle: Installation, maintenance, and repair of electrical systems and wiring.

works.1: - Installation and replacement of electrical wiring;
works.2: - Installation and replacement of outlets and switches;
works.3: - Connection and installation of lighting fixtures (chandeliers, lamps, wall lights, etc.);
works.4: - Installation and connection of electrical panels and circuit breakers;
works.5: - Installation and connection of electrical appliances (electric stoves, water heaters, etc.);
works.6: - Conducting electrical measurements and network testing;
works.7: - Repair and maintenance of electrical systems;
works.8: - Installation of grounding and lightning protection systems;
works.9: - Setup and installation of smart home systems;
works.10: - Connection of household appliances and electronics.

3.title: Plumbing
3.subTitle: Installation, repair, and maintenance of water supply, drainage, and sewage systems.

works.1: - Installation of water supply and sewage pipes;
works.2: - Installation of various auxiliary devices (meters, filters, etc.);
works.3: - Installation of sinks, bathtubs, shower cabins, and toilets;

4.title: Air conditioning and heating
4.subTitle: Installation, maintenance, and repair of HVAC systems to ensure efficient climate control.

works.1: - Installation and maintenance of air conditioners;
works.2: - Installation and maintenance of ventilation systems;
works.3: - Installation and maintenance of heating boilers;
works.7: - Maintenance and repair of heating and climate control systems;
works.8: - Design and installation of climate control systems;
works.9: - Installation and maintenance of humidifiers and dehumidifiers;
works.10: - Preventive inspection and cleaning of heating and air conditioning systems.

5.title: Swimming pools
5.subTitle: Design, construction, and maintenance of residential and commercial swimming pools, including filtration, heating, and safety systems.

works.3: - Construction and installation of swimming pools (reinforced concrete, composite, frame pools);
works.4: - Installation and connection of filtration systems;
works.6: - Installation and adjustment of pool lighting systems;
works.7: - Installation and adjustment of automatic water cleaning systems;
works.8: - Installation of hydro-massage and air-massage systems;
works.9: - Maintenance and repair of swimming pools;
works.11: - Installation and adjustment of automatic pool covers.

6.title: Relocations
6.subTitle: Coordination and execution of moving services, including packing, transportation, and setup for residential and commercial properties.

works.1: - Assessment of the scope of work and planning the move;
works.3: - Packing of furniture and personal belongings;
works.4: - Dismantling and packing of large items;
works.5: - Loading belongings into the transport vehicle;
works.6: - Transportation of belongings to the new location;
works.8: - Assembly and installation of furniture at the new location;
works.10: - Cleaning of premises after the move;

7.title: Dismantling and waste removal
7.subTitle: Safe dismantling of structures and efficient removal of debris and waste from construction and demolition sites.

works.1: - Assessment of the volume and complexity of the work;
works.2: - Preparation and fencing of the work area;
works.3: - Demolition of walls, partitions, and ceilings;
works.5: - Dismantling of roofs and attic spaces;
works.6: - Removal of floors and floor coverings;
works.7: - Removal of plumbing and electrical appliances;
works.8: - Dismantling of window and door structures;
works.9: - Sorting and packaging of construction waste;
works.10: - Loading and removal of construction debris;
works.11: - Cleaning the area after demolition work.

8.title: Legal support
8.subTitle: Comprehensive legal services including consultation, documentation, and representation for construction projects, ensuring compliance and resolving legal issues.

works.2: - Preparation and analysis of legal documents;
